title: Europe to cross USD 500 million by 2015-2016 for Enterprise Mobile Security
text:
The report titled Enterprise Mobile Security Market - Europe Outlook (2015-19) showcases an in-depth analysis of the Enterprise Mobile Security market in terms of market size and the respective market forces (drivers, constraints, opportunities and challenges). This report also forecasts the growth numbers till 2019 (on a YoY basis) and hence suggests the Compound Annual Growth Rate (CAGR) for the estimated period.
Increased attacks on mobile devices to create a need for enterprise mobile security software
The European market for Enterprise Mobile Security is the fastest growing among all other regions in the world. This is largely due to the recent increase in cyber threats like Trojan viruses, code injections, botnets, data theft, identity fraud, phishing and spam. Most of these security issues are also found in mobile handheld devices as well. The use of enterprise mobile security software is expected to take care of the security issues capable enough to fight mobile threats.
Market Segments and Forecasts Covered in the Report
The Europe Enterprise Mobile Security market is segmented by:
- Deployment (On-Premise, Cloud)
- End users (Enterprise, Mid-size, Small Business)
- Industry (Financial Services, E-commerce, IT and Telecommunication, Healthcare, Retail, Others)
Companies discussed in the Global Enterprise Mobile Security market research report include Kaspersky, McAfee, Symantec, AVG, Sourcefire, IBM, Palo Alto Networks, Check Point Software, NQ Mobile, Viasat, Safenet, AT&T, Inside Secure, Dell Secureworks, HP, Blue Coat Systems, F-Secure, Trend Micro, CA Technologies and Oracle.
